attributes.action: All asthmatics on inhaled steroids should be in Group 6 for COVID vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: Amend the guidance to include asthmatics on steroid inhalers and who are called for a flu vaccine every year to be in group 6.
attributes.background: All asthmatics on inhaled steroids are still being advised by NHS guidelines that they are at increased risk/clinically vulnerable and must be especially careful yet are not being offered a vaccine in Group 6.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569984
